research_library.storage_path.description: Base path for storing research library documents. Each user will have their own subdirectory unless shared library is enabled.
research_library.storage_path.name: Library Storage Path

research_library.shared_library.description: When enabled, all users share the same library directory. Documents from all users will be visible to each other.
research_library.shared_library.name: Shared Library Mode

research_library.pdf_storage_mode.description: Choose how PDFs are stored. Each user has their own encrypted database. Database mode stores PDFs encrypted within it (secure, portable, isolated per-user). Filesystem mode stores unencrypted files on disk (faster for large files). None stores only extracted text (smallest footprint).
research_library.pdf_storage_mode.name: PDF Storage Mode

research_library.enable_pdf_storage.description: DEPRECATED: Use pdf_storage_mode instead. Kept for backward compatibility.
research_library.enable_pdf_storage.name: Enable PDF Storage (Legacy)

rag.indexing_batch_size.description: Number of documents to process in parallel during RAG indexing. Higher values are faster but use more memory.
rag.indexing_batch_size.name: RAG Indexing Batch Size

research_library.max_pdf_size_mb.description: Maximum allowed PDF file size in megabytes. PDFs larger than this will not be stored.
research_library.max_pdf_size_mb.name: Maximum PDF Size (MB)

research_library.upload_pdf_storage.description: Choose how user-uploaded PDFs are stored. Database mode stores PDFs encrypted in your personal database (increases database size but allows viewing/downloading later). Text Only extracts and stores only the text content (smallest footprint). Note: Filesystem storage is not available for uploads for security reasons.
research_library.upload_pdf_storage.name: Upload PDF Storage

research_library.confirm_deletions.description: Show confirmation dialogs before delete operations. Recommended to keep enabled to prevent accidental data loss.
research_library.confirm_deletions.name: Confirm Deletions
